label: Modern Dance II
description: Intermediate dance technique and improvisation. For non-dance majors. May be repeated to a maximum of 8 hours. Prerequisite: DANC 101 or consent of instructor.
courseSectionInformation: May be repeated to a maximum of 8 hours. Prerequisite: DANC 101 or consent of instructor.
classScheduleInformation: Student costs for supplies and concert tickets: Approx. $30. Written assignments and concert attendance is required.
